website_summaries.verdict: These classic heels offer beauty and comfort, both of which are important to a bride. Stylish and affordable, they are a solid choice for the big day.
pros: Between the bow in the back and jeweled ankle strap, there’s no shortage of details
These shoes are comfortable for all-day wear, possessing a 3.5-inch heel
cons: Bow on back of heel can be difficult to tie

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look so nice and elegant out of the box but crystals fell ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I wore these for my wedding day and they were a nightmare! the back ties don't stay tied and came undone every 5 minutes until I finally got rid of them all together. I almost tripped and fell repeatedly. They looked beautiful but not functional at all. ORIGINAL POST: Shoes look so nice and elegant out of the box but crystals fell out almost immediately. I glued them back on but Im hoping not to have anymore casualties before the wedding. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Might want shades for all the bling these beauties give off!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely stunning in person. I received more compliments on the shoes than anything else. The only thing was that the ankle straps were not tight enough so my husband pulled back the rhinestone strip, trimmed it and then the strap could be adjusted tighter. A very nice heel that was a comfortable height to be worn all night. Now I did have sore feet but that was from neglecting to remember that I would have to park in downtown New Orleans for the event and traverse cobblestone streets. Not advisable. These added major bling to the outfit I wore for an upscale company Christmas party.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so beautiful! I’ve worn them twice! Comfortable and stylish. One thing to note is to not take the ribbon apart to put the shoe on it’s hard to put back. The shoe can be put on without taking the ribbon out.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY BEAUTIFUL!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These heels are perfect!! There is no other way to put it. They arrived neatly packaged. Once they were unboxed they shined like a diamond. The black shined as if it had been polished and the stones that go around the ankle just sparkled!!!!! The pretty bow that sits behind your heel sat up soo high. The evidence of fine workmanship!!!!!!!! And last but not least the heel stood the perfect height!
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This shoes is so comfortable. I purchased it to wear to my wedding and I have no regrets. I wanted a Badgley mischka at first but I'm not sorry i didn't
customer_reviews.author: ZARNA NEWLAND

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Order for my 15 years 8th grade graduation it was a good buy. Not to high not uncomfortable for a beginner heel wearer.
customer_reviews.author: Ja Rule

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. Ordered them for my wedding and got so many compliments. They are comfortable and I wore them for about 13 hours and didn't get sore feet or ankles. I am already 5' 8" so I didn't want anything too high of a heel. This was perfect to give me a little height without the pain of a 4" or 5" heel all day. Unfortunately we walked around a park for photos so they are now scuffed and brown. I will order another pair for upcoming events with heels I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but gems not strong
customer_reviews.text: Super cute I’ll wear for my wedding however they came in with a gem missing in still going to wear them but what the heck
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted for my wedding shoes. They are simple, sophisticated, sexy and delicate. The heel isn't too high, and the ankle strap makes walking much easier that just wearing a regular pair of pumps. I have slightly wide feet and the front of the shoe is snug, but not squished. Look up how to tie a simple bow on youtube, and the back will look like the picture. I highly recommend these as a special occasion shoe. I also have thicker ankles and these fit well, and they are super slimming!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Tschetter

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are beautiful, comfortable and very feminine
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful, comfortable and very feminine. I absolutely love them! They are comfortable enough to wear all day. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because I had to adjust the ribbon strap a few times. Otherwise, I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LJones

customer_reviews.title: They did look nice but if you have thin ankles
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back. You can only tie the bow so tightly and I have thin ankles for the size of my foot. They did look nice but if you have thin ankles, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. O. Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size, but they're HIGHLY uncomfortable. I had to put heel cushions in them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jemima Jean-Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide width feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as my wedding shoes! they are perfect, I love them so much! I have wide feet and high arches and these feel pretty comfortable, given the height (about 3.5 inches). No pinching at the toes! which is so rare for me haha. I am usually 6.5w, and got these in 6.5m. They do run a smudge large. If you have narrower feet perhaps you might want to order a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were pretty and going to be my wedding shoes but they ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were pretty and going to be my wedding shoes but they came dirty and scuffed all over. The shoes came as is shown in the picture . They didn't even try to fit everything back. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoes but it came in dirty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shoe but it came in dirty with stains in the toe area. It looks like it had been worn. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Wore these all night and they were not terribly uncomfortable. Photographed beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Wore on my wedding day! Wore these all night and they were not terribly uncomfortable. Photographed beautifully. I would recommend stain-guarding the portion under your toes & the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but do not have any grip at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but do not have any grip at the bottom. Very dangerous on tile and/or slick floor. I had to buy grippers for the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful and sexy shoe, I got many compliments, it went with the dress I wore perfectly, love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Just Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wedding; they fit great! I have pretty wide feet (I usually buy size 7W) and was thinking I should buy 1/2 bigger.... but the standard 7 fits perfect! I read and took the advice of other reviews, so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Msmisse83

customer_reviews.title: loveeee
customer_reviews.text: I'm n love with this shoes. The size is true to size. They are so amazing. I'm going to wear them on my friend's wedding :)
customer_reviews.author: Sayara

customer_reviews.title: Tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: My wedding shoes! Love these. Comfortable and easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes. I got my normal size of 9 and my heel does not come to the back of the shoe. I have a bridal shoot this weekend I planned to wear these shoes. I am hoping my foot doesn't slide out of the side and make me fall...guess we shall see...😁 If you plan to order, I'd say order a 1/2 size smaller...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: In love with these shoes! Even prettier in person. The only downside is you have the untie and retie the bow to get the shoe on and off. Super comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: So huge. At least 2 sizes bigger than what I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these shoes. I bought them for my wedding and can't wait to wear them again. They are so comfortable and so chic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were purchased to wear to a friends wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased to wear to a friends wedding as a bridesmaid. These shoes have no grip on the bottom and are very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Regina H.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are adorable but were too big for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are adorable but were too big for me. The little ankle strap doesn't fit tight enough so basically my foot was just floating around in the shoe. Super easy to break an ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Berendt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, cute, going to go perfect with my wedding dress!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Show stoppers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful, and are show stoppers on. They are comfortable enough to wear at a multi hour event.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfortable shoe. Returned because I couldn't picture walking in these shoes all done in my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: ericauger

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. Heel is 3" only thing is they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these gorgeous shoes for my wedding. They are exactly as shown in the pictures. They are very comfortable. Heel is 3" only thing is they are a bit slippery. Other than that shoes are great they look very elegant I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna P.

customer_reviews.title: I had tho keep tying the cloth strap:(
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful shoe. The cloth ankle strap loosens very easily which makes the shoe feel bigger than it is. I rated 3 stars because they came dirty and I had to wipe down the back.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Foster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes! Worn for my wedding! Although half a size bigger but still worked beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Elegant & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The heel height was just right. Many compliments on this show! Elegant definitely less is more. Completed my ensemble.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Stunning special event shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my mom for a wedding. The shoe is beautiful, but just a tad short. She plans to keep them though. They are a perfect completion for her ensemble.
customer_reviews.author: modub

customer_reviews.title: Elastic strap just for show not functional
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the elastic strap. It did not have any stretch to it and almost impossible to get your heel passed the strap.
customer_reviews.author: roseanne mortellaro

customer_reviews.title: Elegant shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought these to wear during college graduation. She looked very dignified in them and the shoes made the outfit: both dress and gown!
customer_reviews.author: Margret77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old daughter is happy to have them! thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Elegant Heels
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my wedding, I really liked the simple look. I usually wear an 8.5 however I ordered a 9 considering it was a heel. The 9 was way to big. They didn't have my size so I couldn't reorder.
customer_reviews.author: JAYNEEN PIMENTEL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but satin ribbon loosens during wear
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty comfortable, but the satin tie loosened several times, and I wasn't even dancing. I think it's just the nature of the satin ribbon. These were beautiful and I got several complements on them.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful! They do seem to run a half size big.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister to wear on her wedding. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: NQ

customer_reviews.title: danced all night!
customer_reviews.text: wore these at my wedding and didn't have to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Some of the rihnstones are missing not happy this is why Im returning them besides the size ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes came damage. Some of the rihnstones are missing not happy this is why Im returning them besides the size is a little small.
customer_reviews.author: sheila Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Wedding shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a wedding should, fit was perfect, strap fit ankle as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe, love the bling on the strap and the ivory satin bow. Perfect wedding shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, ultra feminine and sexy.
customer_reviews.text: Stunning, ultra feminine and sexy. Totally adjustable ankle straps provide stability.
customer_reviews.author: Keepemstylish

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful but they have no tread on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful but they have no tread on the bottom. Spend a couple bucks on some stick-on pads for traction
customer_reviews.author: mikerosier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes! Very elegant...perfect for my daughter's wedding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute and comfy! I loved the price as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bow comes undone easily, but really love these beautiful shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen Gill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nina heels
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit very true to size so pretty and comfortable only thing the bottom material is slipery and made of a not so well material feels like cardboard but for my one use is okay very pretty in deed
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Will be wearing them for my upcoming wedding 👰
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't get my foot pass the strip. have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Walker

customer_reviews.title: cannot get my foot past the ankle strap!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful but I could not even get my foot into it to try it on! The ankle strap does not stretch or detach so you can get your foot in. Seriously people? How do you expect an American foot to go into this shoe?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I bought these for my upcoming wedding in January. I'm obsessed with bows and this was the cutest one that I found where I can tie a bow in the back (with decent pricing). Fits just as expected, but the arch support is almost none since I do have a rather "flat foot". But other than that, I think I can rock these for a couple of hours at my wedding....hopefully :) They're only 3.5" tall so not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Smylie

customer_reviews.title: The ankle strap is NOT adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive these shoes until I realized that the ankle strap is NOT adjustable. By the time I wedge my ankle into the shoe/strap the satin had stretched slightly making the strap fit awkwardly around my ankle. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: April Aceto

customer_reviews.title: Great show, great height!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do run narrow but I have narrow feet. They are going to be perfect for my wedding day. They're a tad bit lighter ivory than my dress is but they won't be seen and the difference isn't that noticeable. I've had foot surgery and have metal hardware in my foot and these are the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: thecocoarose

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They are not made for a wide foot! And they are very wobbly!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Carls

product_meta.title: NINA Women's Vinnie LS Dress Pump
product_meta.description: These sweet sandals are the epitome of perfection! Easy slip-on wear with elasticized ankle strap and back tie. Soft satin upper with sparkling ankle strap. Man-made lining. Lightly cushioned man-made footbed. Wrapped heel. Leather sole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 3 1⁄2 in Weight: 7 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8.5, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
